name: Rush Legends
description:
"Rush Legends" is a First Person Hero Shooter with parkour mechanics.

Each hero has 2 unique abilities to master. Wallrun and vault to traverse the map faster and outplay your enemies.

Game Features :

-High action shooting
-Wall running and Vaulting
-8 characters with different weapons and abilities
-4 maps
-Easy to learn hard to master gameplay
-------------------------------------------------------------


Controls - Keyboard/Xbox

WASD/Left Joystick - Movement

Mouse/Right Joystick - Look around

Space/A - Jump

Left click/LB - shoot

Right click/RB - aim

R/X - Reload

F/B - Skill

G/Y - Ultimate

Tab - Scoreboard

P - Pause
